meta.description: The platform to understand your clients and boost your business. In-depth metrics, client retention and total control of your company.

hero.heading: Understand your clients, grow your business
hero.paragraph: LupaPyme gives you the necessary tools to analyze your business metrics, understand your clients' behavior and make strategic decisions to increase retention and sales.

features.title: All the tools you need in one place
features.paragraph: From detailed analytics to communication tools, LupaPyme has everything you need to take your business to the next level.

featureOne.title: Advanced Analytics
featureOne.paragraph: Visualize your sales, clients and products like never before. Identify patterns and opportunities for growth.

featureTwo.title: Client Segmentation
featureTwo.paragraph: Classify your clients automatically based on their purchase behavior. Create personalized strategies for each segment.

featureThree.title: Direct Communication
featureThree.paragraph: Contact your clients via WhatsApp or Email directly from the platform to build loyalty and boost sales.

faq.description: Have questions? We have answers. If you can't find what you are looking for, please contact us.

questions.question: What is LupaPyme?
questions.answer: LupaPyme is a platform that helps small and medium-sized businesses analyze their business data to make better decisions, with a focus on client retention.

questions.question: How does it work?
questions.answer: You connect your sales system (or upload your data) and LupaPyme automatically processes it to generate key metrics and reports.

questions.question: Is it secure?
questions.answer: Yes, we take security very seriously. All your data is encrypted and protected with the highest security standards.

questions.question: What is the price?
questions.answer: We have different plans that adapt to the needs of your business. You can check them on our pricing page.
